summary: Changes the crafting system of how a weapon or armor is made.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]LOOKING FOR HELP WITH THE MESHES-TEXTURES!

[size=3][color=#f4f4f4]My goal is to add more depth into how smithing works.Making a battleaxe from iron ingot is not realistic and this mod aims to fix that.You should make a rod before you craft yourself a blade and a grip before you can craft your sword.This mod is in very early development[/color][/size][/size] stage and i only managed to make iron sword.As i cant 3d model i need help to make this mod real.
author: Deathbug
